alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Nicollet (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 1:55AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BLUE EARTH AND SOUTHEASTERN NICOLLET COUNTIES THROUGH 230 AM CDT... At 155 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Good Thunder, or 9 miles southwest of Mankato, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mankato, North Mankato, Lake Crystal, Eagle Lake, Madison Lake, St. Clair, Garden City, Skyline, Mankato Airport, and Minneopa State Park. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 126 and 143. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 36 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
